body:
> Looking at the code in the add-on, it is already correctly adding ?enabled=1 to its requests.

I'm not seeing the `?enabled=1` in my dev server logs. I double checked that querystrings are included in Django dev server logs, so I wonder if the way we're adding that parameter is wrong.
body_text:
Looking at the code in the add-on, it is already correctly adding ?enabled=1 to its requests.

I'm not seeing the ?enabled=1 in my dev server logs. I double checked that querystrings are included in Django dev server logs, so I wonder if the way we're adding that parameter is wrong.
body_html:
Looking at the code in the add-on, it is already correctly adding ?enabled=1 to its requests.

I'm not seeing the ?enabled=1 in my dev server logs. I double checked that querystrings are included in Django dev server logs, so I wonder if the way we're adding that parameter is wrong.
